page.title: 11Farms. 1
page.content: {Broomhangings.}This farm covers 78 acres of land. 60 acres are crop land including oats and barley for malting, sugar beet for factories and vegetables for the farm shop. They have 8 separate fields.1/4 acre is covered by glass houses containing vegetables for the farm shop. 18 acres are mixed woodland. They have 250 hens for laying eggs. "Hangings" from the name means wood and "Broom" is a plant. The owners are Mr.and Mrs. Culley. {Shaws.}This farm covers 140 acres of land. The farm is a crop farm with no animals. The crops are wheat, peas and potatoes for human use. Barley is grown for all sorts of purposes and rape is used in the manufacture of face cream. The farmer has recently had 3 bad years for crops in his 6 fields.
